source.092003e9:
Every middle class man need some sort of trigger to improve his business and
the main ingredient is money and it isn’t some fantasy to get money from tree or for
free,so here comes the hero “Loan”,it is system which offers money to the customers
but not for free ,the customer can return the money periodically once his business
starts growing.Ok so,who provides the loan?well,banks are the legal providers and in
this project we focus on minimizing bank’s risk in other words selecting the
customers who guarantee or have the capability to repay it.So the factors like
collateral ,income etc.. comes into the play.So in this loan prediction problem is to
classify the risk free customers and target them.^^
